import logo from './logo.svg'; import {useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Login from './components/Login' import Homepage from './components/Homepage' function App() { let [isLogin,setLogin] = useState(false); let [user,setUser] = useState(); const handleLogin = (event) => { event.preventDefault() let {uid,pass} = document.forms[0] Login({uid: uid.value, pass: pass.value}) setLogin(sessionStorage.getItem("isLoggedin")) } const handleLogout = (event) => { sessionStorage.setItem("isLoggedin",false) setLogin(sessionStorage.getItem("isLoggedin")) console.log("login ",isLogin) } return (
isLogin ? <> : <>
